clues.text: This meanie in "Hansel and Gretel" was written for a mezzo-soprano but is sometimes sung by a tenor

His Opus 68 is "From the Bohemian Forest", composed around 1883

rounds.category: FILL IN THE BEST PICTURE TITLE

Place of business featured in Edward Hopper's famous "Nighthawks"
Of red, yellow, & green, skin color of Baracoa variety of banana

Of Ford, Carter, or Reagan, the one to have a dam named after him

rounds.text: This community outside Washington, D.C. is named after a Presbyterian church built there in 1820
